divs: sighting detailsto whom it may concern: in october 2009 while attending the houston airshow my girlfriend and i observed several small, silver disks hovering way above the show. other people also observed them as well but because we could not definitively identify them we dismissed them as irrelevant, yet intriguing. today (2\28\11) while i was going through old files on my computer i ran across a video from that airshow. i was shocked at what i saw come flying into the shot between 0:00-0:04 seconds of the video; another unidentified flying object that at the time would have been too fast for the eye to catch. i am attaching photos of ufo���s in the sky, along with the video for your own analysis. p.s. i did a search on the internet about this event and it looks like we were not the only ones that saw something that day.
